created_by: Endgame, JHasenbusch (adapted to Sigma for oscd.community)
name: Net.exe User Account Creation
description: Identifies creation of local users via the net.exe command.
false_positives: Better use event IDs for user creation rather than command line rules.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) AND process.command_line:*user* AND process.command_line:*add*)`
